name: node_modules_config
description: Webpack with ts-loader and stylelint config.
author: Lukáš Chylík

scripts.bundle: npm run build:production && npm run bundle:global.css
scripts.bundle:global.css: npm run compile:global.scss && postcss wwwroot/css/style.css --config ./postcss.config.js | cleancss -o wwwroot/css/style.min.css
scripts.compile:global.scss: npm run stylelint && node-sass --source-map=true Resources/Stylesheets/scss/style.scss wwwroot/css/style.css
scripts.watch:global.scss: npm run bundle:global.css && watch "npm run bundle:global.css" Resources/Stylesheets/scss
